tags: OUHHH MY GIRLIES???!? THANK YOU SO MUCH WHA!!! ü•∫ü•∫ü•∫ü•∫‚ù§Ô∏èüíï‚ù§Ô∏èüíï‚ù§Ô∏èüíï‚ù§Ô∏è
summary:
Another Artfight attack, probably my last one for the year (unless I get something done quickly today)
This has been one of the...
body:
kaynon:

Another Artfight attack, probably my last one for the year (unless I get something done quickly today)

This has been one of the biggest pieces I have ever made, it took me anywhere between 22 and 32 hours over the course of the last two and a half weeks. There were a lot of things happening in between working on this which is why I‚Äôm not entirely sure about the time. The full timelapse video is 16 minutes long. I‚Äôm really glad I pivoted from trying to make this into a comic, I don‚Äôt know that I would‚Äôve finished it if I had. This is one of the only pieces with full shading I did this artfight, I didn‚Äôt draw in a light source but I really tried to work off of one. Even though I had a reference photo for the sketch, a lot of these poses were new to me and some were difficult to figure out (a couple of legs are missing, and one of the mugs are weird)

Overall I wanted to draw a bunch of pirates (loosely inspired by a scene in Bloody Cape) and that‚Äôs what I did and I‚Äôm pretty pleased with how this turned out


Solevi ‚ÄòLevi‚Äô Starlance belongs to tieflingcxre, @tieflingcxre on here

W.H. belongs to fuzzheadlola

Luciana Requin-Tibur√≥n belongs to LeafyLilac, @leafy-lilac on here

Rina belongs to hamjoe

Tempest and Callisto belong to CaptainHarrie, @diosmaden on here

Leandro Acosta belongs to Teeb, @tinta–branca–art on here

Elaine Sherwood belongs to AmyIssen, @amy-issen on here

Therasia belongs to kaeri, @glitterrgalax on here

Green belongs to 7lizardsinacoat, @7lizardsinacoat on here

Arlo belongs to 8regrets


Timelapse under the cut

Keep reading

This has been one of the biggest pieces I have ever made, it took me anywhere between 22 and 32 hours over the course of the last two and a half weeks. There were a lot of things happening in between working on this which is why I‚Äôm not entirely sure about the time. The full timelapse video is 16 minutes long. I‚Äôm really glad I pivoted from trying to make this into a comic, I don‚Äôt know that I would‚Äôve finished it if I had. This is one of the only pieces with full shading I did this artfight, I didn‚Äôt draw in a light source but I really tried to work off of one. Even though I had a reference photo for the sketch, a lot of these poses were new to me and some were difficult to figure out (a couple of legs are missing, and one of the mugs are weird)

trail.content:
Another Artfight attack, probably my last one for the year (unless I get something done quickly today)

This has been one of the biggest pieces I have ever made, it took me anywhere between 22 and 32 hours over the course of the last two and a half weeks. There were a lot of things happening in between working on this which is why I’m not entirely sure about the time. The full timelapse video is 16 minutes long. I’m really glad I pivoted from trying to make this into a comic, I don’t know that I would’ve finished it if I had. This is one of the only pieces with full shading I did this artfight, I didn’t draw in a light source but I really tried to work off of one. Even though I had a reference photo for the sketch, a lot of these poses were new to me and some were difficult to figure out (a couple of legs are missing, and one of the mugs are weird)

Overall I wanted to draw a bunch of pirates (loosely inspired by a scene in Bloody Cape) and that’s what I did and I’m pretty pleased with how this turned out


Solevi ‘Levi’ Starlance belongs to tieflingcxre, @tieflingcxre on here

W.H. belongs to fuzzheadlola

Luciana Requin-Tiburón belongs to LeafyLilac, @leafy-lilac on here

Rina belongs to hamjoe

Tempest and Callisto belong to CaptainHarrie, @diosmaden on here

Leandro Acosta belongs to Teeb, @tinta–branca–art on here

Elaine Sherwood belongs to AmyIssen, @amy-issen on here

body:
[TIMELAPSE] Callisto Portrait | Captain Harrie

Man tumblr absolutely crunched this preview clip. Oh well you can click through to see it better!

I don’t mention my patreon a lot, but every week I post a timelapse for the comic page that went up on patreon that week, and when I finish a piece I think will make a fun timelapse, I also post those timelapses!

So if you’d like to support me and getting to see how I made various pieces sounds interesting, you know where to go! :)

summary: The challenge of the month in the comic creator server im in was "draw your characters as realistically as you can," and I...
body:
The challenge of the month in the comic creator server im in was “draw your characters as realistically as you can,” and I needed to do something to grease the gears after taking the majority of the month off from art, so I painted Callisto :)

¬ª You can read my webcomic here!

tags: its my bday read my comic !!
summary:
do you know what time it is!?! it's time to read my comic babey!!!!
Tempest‚Äîa wanted pirate with no ship and no...
body:
diosmaden:

diosmaden:

do you know what time it is!?! it’s time to read my comic babey!!!!

Tempest‚Äîa wanted pirate with no ship and no attachments‚Äîspends her time dancing around the gallows and making a mockery of the law. She takes and does as she pleases, consequences be damned.

But that might all change when she saves Callisto’s life.

Heart of the Storm is a high fantasy romance set in the world of Diosmaden‚Äîa world where demons and elves are as common as humans, where dangerous beasts lurk deep within the woods and the oceans, and there’s no such thing as horses.

You can purchase chapter 1 as a PDF or read along one page a week for free on ComicFury! First page is out on Friday, the PDF is out now!

Patrons will also be getting one page every day until this Friday so they’ll be 3 pages ahead, as well as getting timelapses of the pages :)

Thank you all for being so patient with me over the years as I’ve gotten this together, I hope you’ll enjoy reading it!! MWAH!!!

The reviews are in !!

people like it :)

You can purchase chapter 1 as a PDF or read along one page a week for free on ComicFury! First page is out on Friday, the PDF is out now!

also hii u get to see the lines for the ch2 cover earlier than intended bc i need things in my portfolio LOL teehee
summary: do people do portfolio day here on tumblr..? I've not really noticed it on here much before LOL. but it can't hurt to make a...
body:
do people do portfolio day here on tumblr..? I’ve not really noticed it on here much before LOL. but it can’t hurt to make a post! So hi, I’m Harrie!

I’m a disabled webcomic artist creating the lesbian fantasy comic Heart of the Storm. I also do commissions! I specialise in character interactions, tarot cards, and floral pieces :)

You can commission me through VGen, and you can get the first chapter of my comic + extra content for ¬£5 on Ko-Fi, or read the free weekly updates on CF :)

Art is my sole source of income, so even if you can’t support me financially, if you like my work sharing this post would be greatly appreciated! Thank you üíï

tags: the wrist is broken but so is the built in model's wrist so what can u do really..........
body:
New CSP Asset Release !

wassup guys i got a new CSP model release for you ! One of my latest commissions features a character with 4 arms which is quite difficult to pose, and finding the options available on the asset store lacking I set up my own additional arm model. It’s easiest to use with 2.2.0+, but it’s compatible with older versions too.

It’s ¬£3 on Ko-Fi or 500CP on the asset store if you also want to draw multiple limbed characters, or I mean you can just use it on its own if you like my hand model is more detailed than the built in model:

[CSP] Additional Poseable Arms - Harrie’s Ko-fi Shop

Additional Poseable Arms & Hands - CLIP STUDIO ASSETS

Thanks for reading! Hope it helps <3

summary:
Happy friday! The rats are back ^_^
But I'm going to be away from my computer for most of this month and I might not manage to...
body:
Happy friday! The rats are back ^_^

But I’m going to be away from my computer for most of this month and I might not manage to get update posts scheduled, so make sure you’re either subscribed on comicfury or through your RSS reader so you don’t miss any pages !!

Start Reading :: Latest Update :: Read All Of CH1 Now

summary: Heart of the Storm :: Precipitation - Harrie's Ko-fi Shop
body:
^ according to these guys you should read my comic. Are you reading my comic?

It’s a lesbian romance about a pirate and the woman she saves from execution. It came out a month ago! Get it here:

Heart of the Storm :: Precipitation - Harrie’s Ko-fi Shop

Also updates for free every friday on comicfury!

Heart of the Storm
